Name: Women in Computer Science Game Jam
Description: Judge for the Women in Computer Science Game Jam, evaluating student game development projects and providing feedback on technical and creative aspects.

Name: LSU Summer Undergraduate Research Forum
Description: Judge for the LSU Summer Undergraduate Research Forum, evaluating undergraduate research presentations and providing feedback on research methodology and presentation quality.

Name: Stetson Digital Media Festival
Description: Judge for the Stetson Digital Media Festival, evaluating digital media works and providing expert assessment of creative and technical achievements.

Name: Baton Rouge Arts Council Decentralized Arts Funding
Description: Judge for the Baton Rouge Arts Council Decentralized Arts Funding program, evaluating arts funding applications and making recommendations for grant awards.

Name: ITT Tech - Digital Media Capstone Projects
Description: Judge for ITT Tech Digital Media Capstone Projects, evaluating student capstone projects and providing professional assessment of technical and creative work.

Name: George Rodrique Digital Art Competition
Description: Judge for the George Rodrique Digital Art Competition, evaluating digital art submissions and providing expert assessment of artistic merit and technical execution.

Name: CxC Digital Media Festival Student Presentations
Description: Judge for CxC Digital Media Festival Student Presentations, evaluating student presentation quality and providing feedback on digital media projects and research.

Name: CxC Digital Media Festival Video Contest
Description: Judge for CxC Digital Media Festival Video Contest, evaluating video submissions and providing expert assessment of video production quality and creative content.
